std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Johanna Alertha Jordina Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1810-1821, page 117. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/4. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 668
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit anywhere in the surname with jordina anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Johanna Alertha Jordina Smit baptism on 26 Mar 1815 (born 8 Mar 1815), daughter of Jasper Smit & Hester van Zijl.

std_narrative.citation:
Johanna, daughter of Jasper Smit & Hester van Zijl, was born on 8 March 1815 and baptised on 26 March 1815. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Johanna Alertha Jordina Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1810-1821, page 117. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/4. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 668
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit anywhere in the surname with jordina anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Johanna Alertha Jordina Smit baptism on 26 Mar 1815 (born 8 Mar 1815), daughter of Jasper Smit & Hester van Zijl.
